Name: Overcast - Walden and the Werewolf
About the game: A mysterious creature has destroyed a village located near Walden's cabin, killing every person residing on the premises. Now, Walden wants revenge. This is the story of an old hunter who has nothing to lose. Jump scares to chill your bones; Exclusive sound-design and horrifying scenarios; Original soundtrack produced by Igo Carminatti. (Played by famous youtubers such as 'PewDiePie', 'Markiplier' and many others)
